label: What is ETH SEA?
desc: ETH South East Asia (SEA) taps into the rich talent pool within emerging markets through an online hackathon coupled with IRL workshops.

label: Who can participate?
desc: Founders, developers, creators, analysts, designers—anyone can join!

label: Can we apply as a team?
desc: You can apply as team consisted of 5 people OR, if you prefer to get things done alone, you can also apply as an individual.

label: What if I don’t have a team or an idea?
desc: Don’t worry, you can join our participants group on Telegram to gain new connections and, perhaps, some fresh ideas to submit! You can also come to our Hacker House to connect directly with fellow builders and mentors who can guide you to develop an innovative idea.

label: When will the applications close?
desc: Application open from April 1st to May 20th. Submission for hackathon starts from May 2nd to May 28th.

label: How does the application process work?
How much does it cost?
desc: Application and hackathon does not require any fee—it’s free!

label: Is it possible for me to attend Hacker House virtually?
desc: Our Hacker House are open and available offline. We do not host the sessions virtually.

label: Do you provide travel reimbursements to hackers attending Hacker House?
desc: Participants are responsible for their own travel arrangements and associated costs when attending Hacker House. We do not cover reimbursement for any expenses to attend our event, including travel expenses.
